summary: Provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests for the Terraform scanning and plan‑analysis runners, verifying path resolution, graph merging, resource detection, nested module handling, filter application, severity recording, compliance checks, check registration, external module processing, and result aggregation.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the Terraform security/compliance scanning tool so that infrastructure‑as‑code policies are reliably enforced and potential misconfigurations are detected early.
